title: What are some harms of laissez-faire capitalism? Are there any possible arguments that I can use against those that think society benefits from laissez-faire capitalism? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure, there are arguments. Just not many good ones. But why in the world would you start from the position of wanting to argue against laissez-faire capitalism… if you don't even know what the arguments are? To have any sensible, rational opinion, you're doing your thinking out of order.

Laissez-faire capitalism is exclusively concerned with economic profit, not human well-being. Sometimes these interests are compatible and produce fantastic outcomes, sometimes they are not and the result is human misery.
